name: create-task
description: Generate a task breakdown for a project deliverable
prompt:
You are a project management expert. Based on the following input, create a detailed task breakdown with:

1. Task title
2. Description
3. Estimated time
4. Dependencies
5. Assignee recommendations

Input: {{input}}

Provide the tasks in a structured format that can be added to the project.

input.description: Describe the deliverable or feature that needs tasks
